seg.output:
Greetings, Bullinger, I am presently considered a preacher, but hope not for long. Thank God, I am doing well, albeit with paternal care. Greet the unknown schoolmaster of Bremgarten and others who trust you. May God preserve us! I ask trustingly for what news or how the situation is, etc. My lord and brother, Doctor Fadian, has written to me that he went to Strasbourg, Ulm, Constance, Basel, as he said, to Bern etc.
I pray God for myself and all of us. I would have written to my lord and brother, the state scribe, and warned him out of spirit; but I know not wither, but what you and Lienharten, also Master Hans Briner, whom I have also written to, do, as if it were included in this, also the others.
May God protect you, dear Bullinger, and take care that you faithfully fulfill His word. Amen.
I wonder in which house you are.
Done in the land of Appenzell, on Wednesday after Sebastian, in year 31.
Your poor servant Hans Vogler.
For brevity's sake I have made Master Hans Briner aware of this writing to hear and warn you etc.
To my beloved in the Lord, Heinrich Bullinger, preacher of the congregation of the city of Zurich, my gracious Lord etc.

Greetings to you, beloved Bulliger, I am currently considered a pandit, but hope not to be for long. I am doing well, thanks be to God, albeit with some fatigue. Greet my unknown schoolteacher from Bremgarten and others, whom you trust. God preserve us! I request news or whatever the situation is etc. My lord and brother, Doctor Fadian, has written to me that he has been to Strasburg, Ulm, Costentz, Basel - as it was said - to Bern etc.
I pray to God for me and all of us. I wanted to write to my lord and brother, the statesman, from the spirit and warn him; I did not know any messenger, however whatever you and Lienharten and master Hans Briner, whom I have also written to, do, if it is included here, and others.
God protect you, dear Bulliger, and be careful to keep God's word correctly. Amen.
I wonder in which house you are.
Done in the land of Appenzell, on Wednesday after Sebastiani in the 31st year.
Your poor servant Hans Vogler.
For brevity's sake I have pointed out to Master Hans Briner on this writing to listen to you, to warn etc.
